description.value: You can clue in all your allies at once. When you use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Clue In] reaction, any of your allies who are attempting the same check to investigate a lead receive the circumstance bonus from Clue In. If you use this ability during an encounter, they must attempt their check within 1 round of when you Clued them In.
